comments:
build I20041116

- In CVS repo view, navigate to HEAD/platform-vcm-home/updates
- Open the site.xml file
- it fails to open
- get the following NPEs in the log:
SiteEditor.isDirty (several occurrences)
FeatureSection.createClient

Full log is:

The site editor should handle IStorageEditorInput.
Alternatively, it should fail early with a PartInitException from its initialize
method if the input is not one it accepts.

I am pretty sure it used to at some point (I remember adding IStorageInput 
support for other PDE editors). But since PDE is under new administration, who 
knows what happened since :-).
